description:
The Nagarekawa Girls decide to participate in the Locodol Festival. The girls are excited for the nationally broadcast gathering of Locodols from around the nation. With no prior contact with other Locodols, as the girls begin wondering what kind of work they perform, Mirai brings the other members back to reality with a certain message.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: On a essayé d`unir nos forces
Yonnin no Chikara de Yatte Mita.
